title: Project 1: Processed Foods
description: Processed foods are cheaper per 100 calories. This bar chart compares the average price per 100 calories between unprocessed and ultra-processed foods, revealing how processed foods are significantly less expensive.

title: Project 2: Climate Change
description: This line chart shows the steady rise in global average surface temperature from 1961 to 2024, highlighting the clear upward trend and acceleration of climate change over recent decades.

title: Project 3: Boston Bikewatching
description: An interactive Mapbox + D3 visualization showing BlueBike traffic patterns across Boston and Cambridge, filtered by time of day.

title: Project 4: Placeholder
description: Placeholder project to test layout and styling for future visualization assignments.
